Package com.gerard.site.controller.command

Interface Command

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChosePuppyCommand, Error404PageCommand, ErrorPageCommand, GoToAdminDogsPageCommand, GoToAdminPhotosPageCommand, GoToAdminRequestsPageCommand, GoToDogsPageCommand, GoToMakeRequestPageCommand, GoToPhotosPageCommand, GoToPuppiesPageCommand, InvalidateSessionCommand, LoginCommand, LogoutCommand, MakeRequestCommand, SetLocaleToBeCommand, SetLocaleToEnCommand, SetLocaleToRuCommand
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface Command
This functional interface services commands that came to router Router . It's implementations should be used with CommandFactory CommandFactory

Has static method that changes localization by specified Language Language changeLocale(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Language) .

Version:
1.0
Author:
Liliya Siadzelnikava

  • Method Details

    • execute

      String execute​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws ServiceException
      Services commands that came to router . Typically implementation may be like this:
      1. Taking some information from the request (from requests parameters | session | cookies)
      2. Executing some logic on this information. It could be business-logic, information from database or smth else.
      3. *(Optional step) Putting the result from the previous step to request (to request attributes or session and etc.) or response (cookies and etc.)
      4. Returning target url page.
      Throws:
      ServiceException

    • getRefererAppContextUrl

      static String getRefererAppContextUrl​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Gets came request's referer application context url
      Parameters:
      request - come request
      Returns:
      url of come request

    • changeLocale

      static String changeLocale​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, Language language)
      Changes app locale to cookie specified . Sets locale value and bundle base name .
      Parameters:
      request - came request
      response - response to this request
      language - language from enum Language Language to set
      Returns:
      come request's url (could be used for routing to the same page)
      See Also:
      Language.LANGUAGE_CODE_COOKIE_NAME, Language.BUNDLE_BASE_NAME_COOKIE_NAME
